language.title: English (US)
language.phrase: Buys last item from your stock
Renews license for one of your resource
Has had its purchase of one of your resource set as refunded
Has had its renewal of one of your resource set as refunded
Activate alternative resource display on all pages
Activate alternative resource display on index
Display terms and conditions in a tab

If you set this option to yes, the resources will be displayed in a grid way on the index and in all your categories with a specific image for the resource configurable through the resource page.
If not set, you can configure it on a category basis.

If you set this option to yes, the resources will be displayed in a grid way on the index with a specific image for the resource configurable through the resource page.
Note that if the above option is set, this setting has no effect.

Set this option to yes to allow sellers to activate invoicing.
Be sure to have followed the how-to here prior to activating it.
Select the default stat currency to be used.
Select the default time range to be used.
Select the currency to use for the resources featuring purchases.

Input the language code in which invoices should be generated.
Supported values are: de, en, es, fr, it, nl
If your language is not in the list, create a new file in src/addons/XFA/Core/vendors/pdf-invoicr/inc/languages by copying one of the existing file and input the new value here.

Input in this list the domain that you want to forbid in the urls (eg. google.com, ...). Maybe useful for malicious user who just don't want to input their real domain name.
Input one domain name per raw (without the http:// and the trailing slash).

A licence checking method is implemented for website restricted digital products.
You can enable it through this option by selecting the most appropriate method for your website.

To find out the best method, you can use the validate_url_test.php file provided within the MarketPlace package, upload it at the root of your forum and call that file in your browser to find out the best method. Don't forget to remove it once you are done.
Set this option to a value higher than 0 to force a minimum price for resources.
Set this option to yes if you want to validate each resource featuring requests.

Input the paypal address to be used for:
- Categories configured to use forum wide information for MarketPlace categories
- Retrieval of the percentage on sales
- Payment of the resources featuring
Replaces standard url by sandbox url to perform tests
Set the number of purchases or licenses displayed per page in the resource view tab.
If you want to retrieve a percentage on sales, input it here, otherwise leave it to 0.00.
Check this option if you want the Terms and Conditions to be displayed in a tab from the resource view.

Check this if you want to activate US like address format display, ie.:
Street
Street2
City
State
Zip
Country
Won't apply to already performed purchases.
Select which usergroup you want users to be moved in case of purchase.
Configuration of the RM MarketPlace add-on from Xen Factory
Displays inside the side navigation on the dashboard pages.
You are being redirected to PayPal please wait.
Activate alternative resource display in this category

If you set this option to yes, the resources will be displayed in a grid way o with a specific image for the resource configurable through the resource page.
Note that if the option to activate on all pages is set, this setting has no effect.
WARNING: the forum admin takes a {percent}% commission on each sale in this category. This commission is automatically collected upon purchases. For more information, please contact us.
Let users ask for payment on a per item basis
You can only validate a pending purchase
You can't refund a non validated purchase

You can set Terms and Conditions globally through your seller dashboard, if you want them to apply leave this field empty. Otherwise input in this field the Terms and Conditions that applies to this resource..

If set, the customer will have to accept your terms and conditions before being able to purchase.
We recommend you to put a link to a simple html page with no layout as it will be displayed inside a frame.
Method 3 - Complex curl with visit / Follow redirect
Method 2 - Complex curl with visit / No follow redirect

Do you confirm you want to delete this purchase ?
If the product is a digital one, the licence linked to this purchase will be disabled.

Do you confirm you want to set this purchase as refunded ?

Note: it doesn't automatically perform the refund, you have to connect to your Paypal account for that. However it does reset the license and everything that is linked to this purchase.

Do you confirm you want to validate this pending purchase ?

Note: all elements related to this purchase will be validated (license, etc...).
On this page, you can configure the default Terms and Conditions you which to apply to your products. You can override it on a per resource basis through the resource edition.

The dashboard is the place where you can manage all your sales as well as the licenses for the digital products.

In the future, it will be also the place where you can find detailed statistics about your products in order to do a close follow-up and optimize your sales.
You can select which type of products can be created by users in the category.

RM MarketPlace is fully based on XenForo Resource Manager, therefore category configuration is simple.
Few recommandations though:
- If you want users to be able to sell physical products or service, don't forget to tick the "Does not have a file" box above.
- If you want users to be able to sell digital products (with or without license duration), either tick the "External download URL" or the "Uploaded file" or both. Anyways, we recommend using only "Uploaded file" if you plan on allowing guests purchases.

On a per category basis, you can set a percentage on sale that you should receive for each bought resource of the category. Percentage amount is automatically charged to the paypal account you set below upon purchase.
You can put decimal value with a maximum of 2 decimal places.
If percentage on sale is also set at options level, this parameter overrides it.
Set the paypal address to be used for the percentage on sale for this category.
Please fill in the information below to get in contact with the seller to purchase this item.

The form below allows you to configure the different information that will appear in the invoices generated for the user if you tick the box to activate invoicing. Invoices will be available for any sale made after or before the invoicing activation.

If your product has restriction, eg. per website or computer, indicate it through this option. If this option is set to yes, the buy button will always be visible, thus allowing customers to buy multiple copies.
Don't forget to indicate what are the restrictions in your resource description.
I agree with the Terms and Conditions
Invalid domain name provided, site is either not reachable or is blacklisted. If you disagree with that, contact the administrator of the website.
Select the license duration, expressed in days, weeks, months or years, during which the user has access to download, set 0 for unlimited license.
Input the number of days before license expiration where users are authorized to renew their license.
Set the domain url for this license before downloading
You must accept the Terms and Conditions
You must set the First Name, Last Name, Street, Zip Code, City and Country fields !
There is no terms and conditions to accept
No featuring duration has been added yet.
There is no license for non digital product
You don't have the permission to purchase
You have not purchased this product or your license is not active

You are not authorized to download this resource, this might be due to different reasons:
- You haven't purchased this resource
- Your license has expired
- Your website URL is not yet set

Your purchase was correctly registered. However, your payment is currently pending thus putting it awaiting validation by the seller.
We recommend you to contact him.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following duration
Please confirm that you want to accept the following featuring purchase
Please confirm that you want to set as refunded the following featuring purchase

Please confirm that you want to remove this resource from sale.
Caution: any data related to the sales (purchaes, licenses...) will be removed from the database.
The price you input is below the minimum required value
Product type not allowed in this category.
The requested purchase and the transaction do not match
Purchase through other mean than paypal
Purchase unavailable due to no existing durations, contact the administrator of the forum.
Redirect to paypal for resource featuring purchase
Redirect to paypal for resource purchase
Register now and buy a copy for {cost}
The requested duration could not be found.
The requested purchase could not be found.
The requested user was not found
Set this option to yes if you want customers to input an URL before being able to download your product.
The resource is not for sale
Only payment through paypal are accepted for this resource
This resource type change is not allowed.

If this option is set and you have selected the option to automatically create a support thread upon resource creation, the thread access for paid resources will be restricted to user who purchased the product and have a valid license (for digital products with restriction).
Set this option to yes if you want sales of your product to continue even when you run out of stock.
Set the domain URL on which this license is going to be used
Free input. Eg. you can input an url for shipment tracking or a shipment number.
In case you select to get data about all currencies, only the number of sales will be displayed.
Thank you {username} for your purchase featuring of: {resource}

Dear {buyer},

You purchase featuring of {resource} has been successfully recorded.

The purchase might be subject to validation, in which case the administrator can accept your request or refund you.

We hope to see you back again soon on our {board},
The Staff
Thank you {username} for your purchase of: {resource}

Dear {buyer},

You purchase of {resource} has been successfully validated.

If it's a digital product, you can visit our forum {board} right now to download the product, after eventually having set your domain name if restrictions applies.

We hope to see you back again soon on our forum,
The Staff
Thank you {username} for your renewal of: {resource}

Dear {buyer},

You purchase of renewal for {resource}has been successfully validated.
Your license is now extended.

We hope to see you back again soon on our forum,
The Staff
Thank you for your payment, you will be shortly redirected !
This image should be maximum 250px x 350px
This logo should be maximum 400px x 250px
Tick this box to sell a digital product or a physical product or a service offer
{name} has been refunded for his renewal of your resource {title}
{name} has been refunded for your resource {title}

Dear {buyer},

You order of {resource} has been updated.

It is now "{shipment_status}".

We hope to see you back again soon on our forum {board},
The Staff

Dear {buyer},

Your purchase featuring of {resource} has expired.

We hope to see you back again soon on our forum,
The Staff

You purchase featuring of {resource} was successfully refunded.

We hope to see you back again soon on our {board},
The Staff

We hope to see you back again soon on our {board},
The Staff

Dear {buyer},

You purchase of {resource} was successfully refunded.

We hope to see you back again soon on our forum {board},
The Staff

Dear {buyer},

You purchase of renewal for {resource} was successfully refunded.

We hope to see you back again soon on our forum {board},
